document_data.name: Dlorna Roaryl
document_data.mainbody: '''Dlorna Roaryl''' was the princess of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]]. She was a member of the  [[Clan Roaryl|Roaryl]] dynasty.
document_data.Personality: Dlorna was an intelligent, just, and diplomatic woman.
document_data.Background: In 1479 DR, Princess Dlorna was very popular among Eskornar nobles, who wanted to elevate her to the throne to replace her father as the monarch of Eskorn.
document_data.Relationships: Princess Dlorna was the younger daughter of King [[Ornan Roaryl]], and the youngest sister of [[Imrar Roaryl|Imrar]] and [[Flandarr Roaryl]].
